title: You can't do "/muteall" while chat restricted btw.
body:
It says "You cannot use the command all while restricted". Legit, I'm trying my best to not listen and read to complete fucking cry babies in my game by trying to mute them all at the get go.

The reason for this is because you can't talk in all chat btw.

replies.body: so hit tab and click the icons by their names?
That sounds like a bug to me.
Riot wants to railroad everyone with a restrict into a perma, so this makes sense. /s
edit interface settings and make the chat bar sooooo tiny you cant even read the words

its funny watching toxic people fight and talk shit.
its part of my daily routine.
